Bandwidth is hiring a Denver Software Development Manager and Senior Software Engineers!

Denver Dev Mgr - https://www.bandwidth.com/careers/openings/?gh_jid=1210142

RALEIGH Sr. Software Engineer - https://www.bandwidth.com/careers/openings/?gh_jid=1382832

DENVER Sr. Software Engineer -https://www.bandwidth.com/careers/openings/?gh_jid=1306755

Why work for Bandwidth? Look at all the great things we have to offer!

• The Whole Person Promise: We make a “Whole Person” promise to our team. You can have both meaningful work PLUS a full life at Bandwidth. We focus on accomplishing our mission as “whole people.” That means we take care of our people—in body, mind and spirit.

• Health: We pay 100% for benefits coverage including Medical, Dental, Vision, Prescription, Life and Disability.

• Fitness: 90-minute fitness lunch with a paid gym membership with shuttle service available for workouts. Onsite cardio gym, locker room/showers, classes, and sponsored sports and leagues. Nutritionist and personal trainer on site.

• Volunteer: We love our neighbors and we have a program dedicated to volunteer opportunities called Bandwidthcares! Every month, we'll visit a local charity to do volunteer work for a couple of hours. If a cause moves you, we encourage you to lead a volunteer team or internal event to help that cause!

Find out more by going to our career portal: http://bandwidth.com/careers/

Reach out to Amy at abruce@bandwidth.com with any questions! :)
